name: spinner-wheel-dev
description: Development and build scripts for Spinner Wheel

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p static && cp -r frontend/build/* static/
scripts.build:full: npm run build:clean && npm run build:exe
scripts.production: npm run build:clean && go run main.go
scripts.setup: cd frontend && npm install && cd .. && npm install
